title: Blizzard is adding a co-op character to HotS

embed.description: Two personalities share the body of Cho'gall: Gall, cunning master of dark magics and forbidden incantations, and Cho, who's never met a problem he couldn't punch really, really hard. When working together, Cho's powerful attacks and Gall's destructive spells feed into each other to make Cho'gall's enemies rue the day they crossed paths with this ogre.

body:
Two players controlling one champion. One moves the guy the other casts spells.

This is hilarious. Solo queue will be fantastic.

10/10 hero Blizzard. My sides. I'm not even mad.
